            I am a bioinformatician with a passion for data analysis, evolution and education.
            My main expertise is turning diverse, complex and messy biological datasets into insights and knowledge.

articles.title: Dr Daria Rago
articles.contents:
Welcome to my personal website, a spot to collect together my research and interests.
If you have no time, click here to download my latest CV.
Otherwise, feel free to check out My Projects to see what I am working on, or visit my Publications to see my papers and presentations.
The fastest way to get in touch with me is via email at daria.rago [at] med.lu.se

articles.title: Publications
articles.contents:
Jansen, M., A. N. Geerts, A. Rago, K. I. Spanier, C. Denis, L. De Meester, and L. Orsini. 2017. “Thermal Tolerance in the Keystone Species Daphnia Magna: A Candidate Gene and an Outlier Analysis Approach.” Molecular Ecology 26 (8): 2291–2305. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1111/mec.14040.


N, Feiner, Rago A, While GM, and Uller T. 2018. “Signatures of Selection in Embryonic Transcriptomes of Lizards Adapting in Parallel to Cool Climate.” Evolution; International Journal of Organic Evolution, January. https://doi.org/10.1111/evo.13397.


Rago, A., D. G. Gilbert, J.-H. Choi, T. B. Sackton, X. Wang, Y. D. Kelkar, J. H. Werren, and J. K. Colbourne. 2016. “OGS2: Genome Re-Annotation of the Jewel Wasp Nasonia Vitripennis.” BMC Genomics 17 (1). https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1186/s12864-016-2886-9.


Rago, Alfredo, Kostas Kouvaris, Tobias Uller, and Richard Watson. 2019. “How Adaptive Plasticity Evolves When Selected Against.” Edited by Jessica C. Flack. PLOS Computational Biology 15 (3): e1006260. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1006260.


Rago, Alfredo, Kostas Kouvaris, Tobias Uller, and Richard A Watson. 2018. “How Adaptive Plasticity Evolves When Selected Against,” June. https://doi.org/10.1101/339622.


Rago, Alfredo, John H. Werren, and John K. Colbourne. 2020. “Sex Biased Expression and Co-Expression Networks in Development, Using the Hymenopteran Nasonia Vitripennis.” Edited by Claude Desplan. PLOS Genetics 16 (1): e1008518. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pgen.1008518.


Rago, A., G. M. While, and T. Uller. 2012. “Introduction Pathway and Climate Trump Ecology and Life History as Predictors of Establishment Success in Alien Frogs and Toads.” Ecology and Evolution 2 (7): 1437–45. https://doi.org/https://dx.doi.org/10.1002/ece3.261.


Tobias Uller, Reinder Radersma, Nathalie Feiner. 2019. “Developmental Plasticity and Evolutionary Explanations.” Evolution & Development. https://doi.org/10.1111/ede.12314.


Wang, X., D. Wheeler, A. Avery, A. Rago, J.-H. Choi, J. K. Colbourne, A. G. Clark, and J. H. Werren. 2013. “Function and Evolution of Dna Methylation in Nasonia Vitripennis.” PLoS Genetics 9 (10). https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pgen.1003872.
